mapper.sql: id, pid, material, uweight1, uprice, uweight2, ccount, status
mapper.select: select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname from reference_packweight t left outer join productpackinfo s on t.pid = s.id where s.status=0 and t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname from reference_packweight t left outer join productpackinfo s on t.pid = s.id where t.status=0 and s.status=0 and s.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname from reference_packweight t left outer join productpackinfo s on t.pid = s.id where s.status=0 and t.status=0
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname from reference_packweight t left outer join productpackinfo s on t.pid = s.id where s.id = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and s.status=0 and t.status=0
select count(*) from reference_packweight t left outer join productpackinfo s on t.pid = s.id where s.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and s.status=0 and t.status=0
select count(*) from reference_packweight t left outer join productpackinfo s on t.pid = s.id where t.status=0 and s.status=0

mapper.update:
update reference_packweight
pid = #{pack.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
material = #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uweight1 = #{uweight1,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
uprice = #{uprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
uweight2 = #{uweight2,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ccount = #{ccount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
